fields.name: Active
fields.description: Active status indicates that a piece of equipment is in active use.

fields.name: Suspended
fields.description: Active status being suspended. Check equipment record for details.

fields.name: Decommissioned
fields.description: Decommissioned equipment. Check equipment record for details.

fields.name: Under Repair
fields.description: Equipment which is being repaired, needs status change and re-validation.
